imdb.plot outline: What is the "Generation Why?" television show? "Generation Why?" is a teen produced television show on Shaw Channel Four and is produced through OPTIONS: Community Services Society (OPTIONS). Our half hour show is comprised of 3 minute edited segments that highlight topics that are of interest and concern to youth. The show has been broadcasting throughout the Lower Mainland since 1995 making it the longest running show on Shaw Channel Four.
